name: Mech Commander
description:
This is a 2-player strategy fighting game. Each player controls a mech and their aim is to reduce their opponents hp to 0. Combat is turn based so each player will have to make a decision on whether the will attack, shield, or heal. Each move they choose charges up their special meter, 1 point for choosing attack, 2 points for choosing shield and 3 points for choosing heal.

Please note that this is a university assignment and not a full game.
